addr: 1470 Madison Avenue. Davis Auditorium, 2nd Floor. New York, NY 10029
title: 33rd International Conference on Screening for Lung Cancer
desc:
The mission of these two days is to present the latest information on CT screening for lung cancer including the diagnostic workup and treatment issues for these screen-diagnosed early lung cancers.  
 Day 1 focuses on the current status of screening for lung cancer, the requirements for reimbursement, importance of the regimen of screening in efficient work-up of findings, and future innovations. At the end of each day, questions from the audience will be addressed by a panel of experts.  
 Day 2 focuses on the increasing frequency of early stage lung cancer and the key issues for the treatment of early stage lung cancer and the research needed to provide answers.
